thread.title: UEFA leaders support Infantino as FIFA election contender
thread.title_full: UEFA leaders support Infantino as FIFA election contender - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: UEFA leaders support Infantino as FIFA election contender
text:
By GRAHAM DUNBAR
AP Sports Writer GENEVA (AP) - UEFA says it will support general secretary Gianni Infantino as a candidate in the FIFA presidential election.
Infantino has been the right-hand man to Michel Platini since 2009 and could take his boss' place in the election if the suspended UEFA president is barred as a candidate.
The UEFA executive committee agreed to the new election strategy at an emergency meeting held via video conference hours before the entry deadline closes later Monday.
UEFA says Infantino, a Swiss lawyer, has "our full support in his campaign to become FIFA president."
Infantino is now "in the process of submitting the required nominations" of five member federations.
